overview:
Neill Austin is the Managing Director for PurchaseControl.com EMEA

Austin is responsible for directing and leading all technical aspects of the business from research and development to strategy implementation. After spending three years as the infrastructure manager he was appointed the role in September 2008 to manage and focus the organic growth experienced by the company.

Previously Austin held technical management positions with HP, Hosting365 as well as running his own IT consultancy. He is also one of the founding members of Phantom 105.2, Irelands only indie rock radio station.
